answers.answer: Hello. My Dh took me out for branch. It was very nice. I hope you had a nice day. I am 30 weeks 1 day today and I had very bad upper back pains all night. As I get bigger pains get bigger too. I was very small before pregnancy, so I think there is a lot of stretching going on and it is painful.Hope everything is going well with you all.

I recieved some flowers for a mommy to be gift from my husband.  I am having horrible insomnia. I think it is due to lack of a comfortable position.  Baby is always up all night.   I am 29 wks 3days.  It feels like my due date will never come!!

well basically stood in bed, majority of the day.  my 3 yr old hugged and kissed me all day long. which at one point was annoying. he rubbed my tummy, he was a little bad but otherwise i was ok.  i became an Aunty today at 2:47 pm, my little nephew Heaven pronounced as (Havion) was borned. he is premee and is goin to need some prayers.  i dont know how he is doin at this moment since my sister didnt get to see him  really. Hopefully later on i would know how he is doing. my sister was 27 wks.

Wow , I will def pray for your sister , you guys were expecting pretty close together, I do hope he will be fine and go home with his mom soon, What happened that caused the pre-term labor if you dont mind my asking , and how much did he weight at birth?

well she has been in the hospital for about a mth now. she wasnt feelin good one day, when he went L and D she was 3 cm dilated and ur bag was hanging out. they stop the contractions and she was  given all types of meds. she was transfered to LIJ, she developed Gestartional Diabetes and was on complete bed rest. her water broke the day before my birthday April 29 she was havin contractions but that boy wasnt ready yet. my B'Day was April 30. couple days ago she  was tellin me she gettin contractions but they werent registerin yesterday they started comin 10mins to  3 mins apart. i presuaded her to ge the epidural she did. they were givin her pictocin. this morning i figured she had the baby but he aint come. i told her man something isnt right normally wid pictocin labor goes along quickly.  aparently they change to change it within  30 mins she went from 5 cm to 10 cm  i was on the phone wid  them around 1:30 something after i hang labor progress and he came  at 2;47  pm that was quick. i dont think she saw him like that, she say he was small,  she aint know how much he weighed or  wat he looked like   really. they put tubes in him and took him away. i will call her in a bit to see if she find out anything and let u knwo.  am goin tomorrow to see her and him. i made it clear to her am gettin one of those 2 bands they gave her. so she better  not play wid me. i have to call our father and her mother to let them knowam goin to pick up my son, i'll post any new info when i return

question: Hope you all had a Happy Mother's Day. How is everyone feeling lately in our third trimester?
title: Did everyone have a Happy Mother's Day?
